short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identifies DOM location, selector and properties of any object in any web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
[ ‚å• option or Alt ] + left click on the object to start then use the navigation console and the tools provided to research and customise your selectors.
